title: Provencal ratatouille
ingredients: ['olive oil for frying', '3 aubergines, diced', '2 courgettes, diced', '1 red pepper, diced', '1 green pepper, diced', '1 large onion, diced', '1 tablespoon salt', '1 teaspoon black pepper', '4 cloves garlic, grated', '2 tablespoons red wine vinegar', '1 teaspoon sugar', '1 teaspoon dried parsley', '1 tablespoon dried thyme', '3 tins plum tomatoes, chopped (only use the juice of 2)']
